SELECT m.*, r.reserv_status FROM untact_estimate_moving m, moving_response r WHERE m.estimate_no = r.estimate_no
AND SUBSTR(depart_address, 1, 2) LIKE '%'|| (SELECT SUBSTR(comp_address, 1,2) FROM business WHERE email = #{businessEmail}) || '%'
AND estimate_type = '대면견적'
AND estimate_type = '비대면견적'
AND request_date = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYY. MM. DD.')
ORDER BY request_date DESC
ORDER BY request_date ASC
ORDER BY SUBSTR(depart_address, 1, 2) DESC
ORDER BY SUBSTR(arrive_address, 1, 2) DESC

SELECT m.*, r.moving_response_no,r.estimate_no, r.first_estimate_type, r.first_estimate_price, r.email AS business_email, r.second_estimate_type, r.second_estimate_price, r.reserv_status, r.comp_name, r.response_memo FROM untact_estimate_moving m, moving_response r WHERE m.estimate_no = r.estimate_no AND r.email = #{businessEmail}
ORDER BY m.request_date DESC
ORDER BY m.estimate_type DESC
ORDER BY r.reserv_status DESC

SELECT m.email user_email, m.request_date, r.*, b.comp_intro, b.phone, b.comp_address, (SELECT AVG(total_rating) FROM review_board WHERE service_type = 3 AND service_id = r.email) total_rating FROM untact_estimate_moving m JOIN moving_response r ON (m.estimate_no = r.estimate_no) JOIN business b ON (r.comp_name = b.comp_name) WHERE m.email = #{userEmail} ORDER BY m.estimate_no DESC

SELECT b.comp_intro, b.phone, b.comp_address, (SELECT AVG(total_rating) FROM review_board WHERE service_type = 3 AND service_id = b.email) total_rating FROM business b WHERE b.member_type = 3
ORDER BY total_rating DESC
ORDER BY SUBSTR(b.comp_address, 1, 2)
